children.info: kwik is a mobile app that allows you to quickly scan a product from the shop you are in and pay for it from the app .
Open Kwik app and use your camera to scan the barcode of the product in the shop. After you've finished shopping checkout from the app and pay using mpesa
You can check shop offers by selecting a shop then clicking on 'Click to see offers' button
To change shop click on the back arrow at the top-left and you will be taken to home to select another shop
After every successful shopping the app calculates your loyalty points and is added to your loyalty points account
you can check out from a different number in your contact list by selecting the contact at checkout after clicking on 'Pay from other number' button
